DOC.brief_summary: Hypothyroidism is a frequent condition in danish women, but often overlooked. Along with fatigue one of the main symptoms is weight gain as a result to significantly decreased energy expenditure. This study was undertaken to elucidate changes in glucose, lipid and amino acid turnover in these patients.
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed hypothyroidism with tsh over 40 mU/L, etiology chronic autoimmune thyroiditis Healthy controls matched regarding sex, age and body mass index Pregnancy, breastfeeding
